website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Tab 4 8 is an affordable Android tablet with a long-lasting battery and decent performance for average multimedia use.

customer_reviews.title: has as good a picture and I can't fault it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a Hudl2 with an ailing battery. It is faster, has as good a picture and I can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Nev B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tablet considering the price. Sure, if you have 300 quid or more to spend you can get a tablet that's faster and slicker, but I just wanted something that I could use to watch YouTube and Amazon Prime videos and read e-Books, and this fits the bill perfectly. After a month of fairly heavy use I can't find any real faults. It has a nice clear display, though I'm afraid I can't speak for the sound as I always wear headphones when using it. It's quite thin and seems a bit fragile so I would recommend putting a case on it, especially if a child will be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Finn

customer_reviews.title: Classy tablet
customer_reviews.text: Classy tablet, light weight and fast processor. Just falls short of 5* as despite turning the volume down to zero and switching all accessible notifications off I still get occasional alerts which doesn't endear me to the sleeping wife
customer_reviews.author: R. Millington

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Decent memory, light, good size screen, sharp picture, decent speakers. Bought as Christmas present for my mum who loves it and can use it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Milbourn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Love these tablets. They are not the fastest on the market but superb for my needs. I use mine to watch tv shows on the train on the way to work. I find I only need to charge it once a week and when it's in standby mode, it uses hardly any power at all. I never turn it off completely, just into standby mode and still, it only needs a charge a week. (My train journey is an hour each way) but I do keep the brightness down quite low which helps. Also, it has a memory card slot which many of the 'better' tablets do not. Bonus
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kieran D. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Does not support 5ghz Wifi
customer_reviews.text: This was returned as I couldn't connect to my 5ghz WiFi at home. Good no quibble return from Amazon (as usual - great retailer). However, it connects to the old 2.4ghz signal beautifully. It's a light, well made tablet with a quality feel. Screen is excellent (very warm and bright as well as being very high resolution) sound is very good too. I regret having to send it back. If you don't have or need 5ghz wifi, this is a really good buy - just not suitable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Potter

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Huddle
customer_reviews.text: My wife's Huddle died (although it was resurected with a new battery) and she was in love with it. She reviewed the many options and came up with this. Made a lovely Christmas present. She has been using it since and thinks it's better than the Huddle - which is quite and achievement.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G. A. Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small tab for travelling, watching movies and the Lenovo caught my eye. Reasonably priced I ordered on and since day one have been delighted with it.Plenty of apps available on the excellent play store, set up is easy, surfing the web quick, video and sound playback both excellent, I can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the kids. Pleasantly surprised at the speed and build quality. It was much better than I expected for the price. Has the latest version of Android and has received a few system updates from Lenovo which is always good to see - shows they are actively supporting the product. I use it with a memory card for expanded storage allowing lots of games be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Daly

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: It's a convenient 8" format, comes with a pretty standard Android v7, has a clear screen, has good battery life, and is great value for money. Perfect for watching YouTube videos, reading news Apps, and social media if you're into that sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Hildon

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for approx 6 weeks now and it's working fine. So much better than the Samsung Galaxy I had, whose battery went serously downhill after less than 3 years and before that I was driven mad by perpetual updates of bloatware I couldnt delete. Hello Lenovo, good riddance Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walker

customer_reviews.title: A very good price comparing with Samsung and Apple and operates and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far very impressed with the tab 4 8 8. I will now look at the Lenovo products. A very good price comparing with Samsung and Apple and operates and works just the same. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FRM

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to public broadband network
customer_reviews.text: This device will not connect to public broadband networks which require a separate connection stage. It shows that it is connected to the WiFi network, but does not offer a screen to allow you to register with the broadband service, which rather defeats the purpose of a tablet. I have now discovered online that this is a known problem, possibly firmware related. Otherwise it is excellent; clear screen, quite fast.
customer_reviews.author: John Marsh

customer_reviews.title: The bees knees
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with it. Had always shied away from getting a tablet. Don't use it too often but it is sensationally quick to fire up. Use my laptop most of the time as I do lots of stuff with Word/Excel etc but this thing is the bees knees!
customer_reviews.author: David E Mason

customer_reviews.title: does what its says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: This arrived within 24 hours of ordering on the free delivery was easy to set up, not being a very IT person and although I don't need it to be very sophisticated, so far (only had it 4 days ) its doing everything I want. Happy with the product especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price and a convenient size, not too bulky. The screen is very sharp and clear, probably superior to our more expensive I Pad, but time will tell. So far, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Toad

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet imo, plays PUBG mobile no problem, plays netflix etc no problem, web surfing is fine, takes a while to charge but battery lasts ages. Not MHL compatible though so cant connect to tv.
customer_reviews.author: Tafflar

customer_reviews.title: Good budget tablet
customer_reviews.text: Good little tablet. Working fine so far and battery seems to last a long time. I only use this for watching movies and Facebook/ email and connecting to internet. Does all great
customer_reviews.author: K. staples

customer_reviews.title: good standard
customer_reviews.text: clean interface reasonably standard android good display and wireless not yet received the upgrade to the next level of android
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product and ideal for my 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: kerry lennon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Shadey

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Good feeling piece of kit. I'm no expert, but it's pretty much what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Happy with performance
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Wife loves it as replacement for her Nexus
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Nice neat little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for old tablet. This one is just the right size, not to heavy to old and really clear picture
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Really worth for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Since now, I'm really happy about it, good battery life, amazing screen resolution, nice features!
customer_reviews.author: Alessio

customer_reviews.title: LENOVO FOR YOU
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I wished for. Easily charged and ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Wilson

customer_reviews.title: As good as new
customer_reviews.text: Looked like it was brand new, great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Eoin O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great, fast little tablet. Can read pdf documents perfectly in portrait and watch Netflix in landscape. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Ilias

customer_reviews.title: ... it for a month now and so far so good I have not had any issues with it and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a month now and so far so good I have not had any issues with it and all seems fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to use does exactly what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4G-CAPABLE
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting this to be a 4G-capable tablet as described, you will be disappointed. This is what I read in the description: "Connectivity: 802.11 b/g/n WiFi; single-channel (2.4 GHz); Bluetooth 4.0; 4G-enabled". For me it's not an issue but if this was a critical requirement it would have been returned. Lenovo produce two versions and the blurb on Amazon is for the 4G version which this is not.
customer_reviews.author: car973

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet a couple of weeks, and am very impressed with the performance. I use it mainly for surfing the web, email and Kindle books - for those applications it is top class. Battery life seems good at the moment, and I've had a couple of system upgrades from Lenovo. There have been a couple of times I wished the resolution was a bit higher but, for the price paid, this tablet is outstanding value. I had to google how to put in the micro SD card and how to add it as additional memory - I think it is worthwhile getting a fast card. I am happy to recommend this tablet
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. Young

customer_reviews.title: Phantom inputs
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like an ok little android tablet until we started seeing the device slow regularly after some minutes of use and occasional bouts of completely random inputs (without us pressing the screen) which rendered it unusable until it was turned off. Had two other Lenovo tabs without this but do have a Motorola(Lenovo) phone which has the same phantom inputs problem.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet but SD card problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tablet and far superior to my previous tablet. The only problem that I have is that it says that the SD card is unsupported. It saves apps onto the card but will not save photos onto the card. I spoke to Lenovo and they could not offer any explanation, but checking on Google it appears that SD card problems are common with this tablet. I do not want to save photos on the tablet so this does not matter to me personally but it may be of concern to some people.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: No Sleep / Wake capabilities
customer_reviews.text: "Kindly Note: The Lenovo Tab 4 8" tablet itself does not have sleep/wake capabilities so that there is no case offering this feature." See  As I mainly use the tablet when drifting off to sleep, this is a massive, massive negative for me, and I now wish I had bought something else. I feel very let down. Not fit for the purpose, as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: NDF

customer_reviews.text: Product conforms to the description of the Amazon ad and conforms to my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers, good material but lack of USB-C, and low resolution screen
customer_reviews.author: Simon L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Having had a previous Lenovo tablet I was happy to buy the brand again. It didn't let me down, speedy and holds its charge really well. Excellent graphics and a big enough screen to handle whatever you want to do without being too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa 91

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, smooth running and perfect for playing pinball ...
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, smooth running and perfect for playing pinball games without any stutter which I used to get on my old tablet. Battery life is good. I think for this price it is amazing value. Best bang for buck on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Edwards

product_meta.title: Lenovo TAB 4 8.8 inches IPS Tablet PC - (Slate Black) (Qualcomm MSM8917 1.4 GHz, 2 GB RAM, Android 7.0)
product_meta.description:
Lenovo TAB 4 8, 8-inchIPS Tablet (Qualcomm MSM8917 1.4 GHz, 2 GB RAM, Android 7.0) - The Lenovo Tab 4 8 delivers a great multimedia experience in an amazing designboasting high-end specifications. It has you covered beyond what other slate tablets offer by helping you secure your data and multi-space functionality. Whether it’s for homework, online shopping, or a screen-time treat, the Tab 4 8 is ideal for the whole family. Stylish yet rugged, this smooth-performing tablet has a vibrant 8” display, enhanced audio, and long battery life. Everyone can have their own account and there are optional add-ons aimed specifically for the younger ones.

Easy sharing - Someone other than you using your device? The Tab 4 8 makes user sharing a breeze, each with their own dedicated profile, interface and storage.
Immersive entertainment - Immerse yourself in deep, booming Dolby Atoms sound that delivers a theatre-like experience for watching movies and shows.
